channel.title: Close
channel.description:
Rune(-)MTP was a very big server a month or two ago. I want to get big again :)
Current Developers/Owners: Marcbob (Just me atm :P)
[b]Information about the Server:[/b] -It is Project insanity but I have worked my wonders on it. -No dupes -Great economy set up for a perfect server -Great Stability -Everything is working 100%
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/hrn1fq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/24wt5c7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/15d6zbb.png[/img]
Lets get back to our once great number of players on at 100+. I started hosting today and got 10+ on very fast because i'm awesome.
Positions Needed: Developers, Administrators, Moderators, and everyone else who joins gets supporter rank.
[b]Apply with this format:[/b]
[code]Position Applying For: Years Experience: Proof of Experience: Can you help get players on?[/code]

Years Experience: Mod : 2 years Admin: 1 year

Contact me via skype or msn

item.title: Close
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

Don’t think I’ll get a position, little later, but hell. Why not try?

Position Applying For: Admin/ Moderator - More of a Community Manager/ Staff Manager
Years Experience: 1/2?
Proof of Experience: I’ve managed my own servers, about 3-4 before 562 came out and I died out from the MSCP community. I know how to manage players, talk to the public, and calm people usually. I won’t lose my temper over disputes and I can easily be a middle man. I am easy to talk to, and easy to get along with. Know a lot about forum software (vB, ipb, smf, mybb) and I am mostly a community kind of person.
I can also be on 3-4 hours weekdays, and a lot more on the weekends.
Can you help get players on? I’ve lost a lot of sources since my time of absence, but I can definitely try.

Read full topic

item.title: Close
item.dc:creator: @liamp liamp
item.description:
@liamp wrote:

[quote=“dclawed, post:82, topic:419906”]Position Applying For:Moderator or an Admin not so bothered which.

Years Experience: Well have played rsps games and played runescape for 2-3 years now. I know alot about rsps. In Zepsity (a rsps) which is now been shut down I was Mod there and was Admin in Flawlscape I didn`t like it as there were only 15 players online most of the time.

Proof of Experience: Well ask people on the rspss and also can log in with admin/mod on the 2 rspss and show you.

Can you help get players on? Yes of course got friends and have great advertising skills. Got a good way which I can share rest of you if you want to know. I am an active player always 1hours of gameplay a day on weekends probably 7 hours.[/quote]

a admin or mod need’s to be on more then 1hour a day lol i dont think u will get accepted but gl on your apply
